original_text: The former proclaim Christ out of selfish ambition, not sincerely but thinking to afflict me in my imprisonment.
korean_text: 그들은 나의 매임에 괴로움을 더하게 할 줄로 생각하여 순수하지 못하게 다툼으로 그리스도를 전파하느니라

sentences.original_text: The former proclaim Christ out of selfish ambition
but thinking to afflict me in my imprisonment
sentences.korean_translation: 오히려 내가 갇힌 것을 괴롭히려고 생각하면서
